Posts.Content: Feb 4, 2013 04:02PM lizardbeth33 wrote: I just had 2 complex cysts drained last week and they were both nothing.  I was also a nervous wreck reading all kinds of intracystic carcinoma crap and drove myself crazy.  Don't worry.  I guarantee you it's nothing.  They just have to make sure because of the very low chance.
Posts.Title: Worried Marly04 ValL

Posts.Content: Feb 7, 2013 07:28AM lizardbeth33 wrote: Thank you for your reply.  I will check out the websites you posted.
Posts.Title: Radial Scar / Complex Schlerosing Lesion lizardbeth33 lizardbeth33

Posts.Content: Feb 10, 2013 04:27AM lizardbeth33 wrote: I had the same thing.  2 biopsies on the right and 1 on the left.  All 3 came out benign but the left has to have an excisional biopsy because they found a radial scar which is a lesion that sometimes hides cancer.  I am in the process of consulting with breast surgeons.  The whole thing has been so draining and scary.  Hopefully everything is benign.
